title: Lima e Cunha (Henrique de)
body: He was born in Barreiro on the 15th of March 1843 and died in S. Pedro de Sintra on the 17th of October 1915. He was an artillery officer, commanded, as a captain, the 3rd artillery company, was a drawing teacher at the Funchal lyceum, and served on a commission in the Directorate of Public Works of the district. E.: Plan of improvements for the island of Madeira, Lisbon, 1879, pamphlet.

Funchal: Place where he was a drawing teacher

1879: Publication of the Plan of improvements for the island of Madeira
